components/products/single-image:
{{> components/common/share-buttons settings.add_this inline-facebook-like=false url=product.url title=product.title image=(getImage product.main_image '600x1200' (cdn theme_settings.default_image)) }}
{{#if product.main_image}}
{{> components/products/gallery/product-slideshow isolate-image=theme_settings.product-slider-isolate-images }}
{{else}} {{/if}}
{{> components/products/gallery/product-thumbnails}}
components/common/share-buttons:
{{#each buttons}} {{#if service '===' 'twitter'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'facebook'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'linkedin'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'email'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'google_plusone'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'print'}} {{/if}} {{#if service '===' 'pinterest'}} {{#if ../../image}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{/each}} {{#if inline-facebook-like}} {{#each buttons}} {{#if service '===' 'facebook_like'}}
{{/if}} {{/each}} {{/if}}
{{#unless inline-facebook-like}} {{#each buttons}} {{#if service '===' 'facebook_like'}}
{{/if}} {{/each}} {{/unless}}
